overview: Prior to founding StyleHop Corp, David spent five years at Liz Claiborne. He joined Liz after completing his MBA at Harvard and held divisional operating roles in production, strategy, sales and planning. David’s last job at Liz was Vice President of DKNY Jeans. Before business school David worked at Procter & Gamble in both sales and brand management.
